item.description:
Hey guys,
Changing the meetup tonight to Black Bear in New Haven.
*** Milford highways are all shut down since a tractor trailer blew up on the highway. As a result, we will hit up New Haven tonight since the traffic issue won't affect anyone (other than the guys coming from south of Milford, which I don't think we have).

-------------

Alright boys, going to switch this Friday night up a little bit.
Let's meet up at Southport Brewing Company, a.k.a. SBC, in Milford on Friday night, May 22nd at 10:00. This place fills up quick with tons of people and is within walking distance of tons of other good spots to bounce to.
Any questions, let me know.

PS - To Sr. members, I (JC) am unavailable to get there earlier for a pre-meetup. If any of the Sr. guys would like to arrange to be there earlier, we can make the meetup start earlier in the night

Please keep in mind that at the end of the month, non-participating memebers will be given notice that they may be deleted from the Connecticut Wingmen. Please make sure to RSVP to ensure this does not happen to you.
item.how_to_find_us: Know me from my pic or call me. (203) 410 6861
item.name: CHANGE - Friday Night - May 22nd - NEW HAVEN
